publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2330 Cathy Jamieson:International Organisations Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament recognises the need for the United Kingdom to implement the international obligations for which the International Organisations Bill makes provision, and agrees that those provisions in the Bill that fall within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament and have the effect of conferring functions on the Scottish ministers should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-2330 Cathy Jamieson: International Organisations Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament recognises the need for the United Kingdom to implement the international obligations for which the International Organisations Bill makes provision, and agrees that those provisions in the Bill that fall within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament and have the effect of conferring functions on the Scottish ministers should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry

S2M-2330 Cathy Jamieson: International Organisations Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament recognises the need for the United Kingdom to implement the international obligations for which the International Organisations Bill makes provision, and agrees that those provisions in the Bill that fall within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament and have the effect of conferring functions on the Scottish ministers should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry
